name: Office Horro game
description:
Made by my Crew name Crazy Offical game studio the remake of the game. hard making this game on unity 

  • WASD or arrow keys to walk around
  • Mouse to Look around
  • Left Mouse Button to fire
  • Right Mouse Button to aim
  • Mouse Wheel to switch weapon
  • R to reload
  • F to pick-up an item
  • Left shift to run
  • Left Ctrl to crouch
  • X to prone
  • Space bar to jump
